title: forgot email and password to account
body: I need to find a way to recover my account I haven't been on for 11 months now, the problem is I lost the email and password I created the account on. Any clue on how I could recover the account?

replies.body: Your best bet would be to reach out to our account team using the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). Do you best to answer the questions given and you should be back on the Rift in no time!
